Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Council Bluffs
There were no other sightings in Council Bluffs on or around August 6th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was using a social network on my iPod touch on my front step and periodically I looked up to the stars as I am an avid stargazer. I seen a light coming over the tree line to my left and didn't see a strobe like an airplane or hear any noise. I watched it till it came into perfect veiw above me and I knew I needed a witness. I ran in the door and grabbed my mom, when we got back outside the object was in the same place as it was when I left it then began it's flight path again. As it moved it preformed loops and sharp movement in all directions like it was being controled by a 4 year old with a joystick. We both watched for two more minutes until it was out of sight. When I attempted to report the event, my iPod had stopped working till exactly an hour had passed since I had began my attempts. After I still feel compelled to chase it down but I know it's not going to be found. I have seen three others in my life and I'm begining to believe that this town has many ufos.
Summary: Was stargazing when I seen a bright white light come over the tree line,I a grabbed witness and returned to it bring in the same place after moving then it began again.
